answers.answer: Your dog may or may not have SARDS causing "overnight blindness", a veterinary eye specialist can diagnose this definitively.The excess water drinking may be due to several conditions depending on your dogs age and medical history including diabetes, cushings disease, kidney failure or a urinary tract infection, which a blood panel and urinalysis performed by your veterinarian would help to reveal.Dr Carol Osborne, DVM

question: My dog went blind seemingly over night, drinks excessive water, and has lost weight ... eating is okay ... any thoughts ... thanks ...
title: Blind over night
